item.title: Turkey arrests dozens over online posts after Erdogan rival detained
item.description: Some 37 people have been arrested for "provocative" social media posts, the interior ministry says.

item.title: Finland named as happiest country for eighth year
item.description: Access to nature and a strong welfare system are cited as factors as Nordic nations dominate the rankings.

item.title: At least 55 killed in new Israeli Gaza strikes, says Hamas-run agency
item.description: It comes as Israel says it has resumed ground operations in Gaza alongside its air campaign.

item.title: Armed men abduct dozens from a bus in Ethiopia
item.description: The incident happened in an area where around 100 students were similarly seized last July.

item.title: Iran releases French tourist held since 2022
item.description: Olivier Grondeau, 34, was arrested on security charges, which his family have always denied.
